article: Dear Jackie, I am happy to get your letter. Do you want  to know  about my schoollife this week? This week I  _  three English classes.Ilearn some new words. And we also  see  an interesting movie in the class. Its name is Home Alone. I like  _  very much. 1 1ike having PE  _  Mr White is my PE teacher. He is my favorite teacher. He is great  _  , and we all like to play  _  him. In  _  class, he teaches us to play basketball, soccer and ping-pong. This week, our class has a basketball game with Class 5 and we win . I like playing  _  best and I want to be a great basketball player. What about you? Can you  _  me something interesting in your school? Write to me soon. Yours, Emma
